title: So I want to audition for a Korean company with rap, I'm pretty good at it even if I didn't get proper training and I wanna ask you for some tips to improve my rap? - Quora

response.answer_text: Well, if you really want to improve your rapping skills wtch rap videos and try to rap as fast as they can. If you can catch up with that video, move on to another video with a faster rap. I'm not a rapper, or training to be one. But if I was, that's what I would do… Fighting!💙 Good luck~~~
